principles: High contrast with purposeful use of white space
Subtle luxury accents through gold/brass tones
Clean grid-based layouts with architectural precision

primary.description: Pure white for main backgrounds and primary text on dark surfaces

secondary.description: Deep forest green - used for hero sections and premium dark backgrounds

accent.description: Muted gold/brass tone for CTAs, highlights, and premium touches

neutrals.description: Used for text hierarchy, backgrounds, and subtle contrasts

usage.backgrounds: Alternate between pure white (#FFFFFF) and deep green (#1C3F3A) for section contrast
usage.text: Dark gray (#2B2B2B) on light backgrounds, white on dark backgrounds
usage.cta: Gold (#C8A882) for primary actions with subtle hover states
usage.cards: White cards on colored backgrounds with minimal shadows for depth

fontFamilies.primary: Serif font family (similar to Playfair Display or Cormorant)
fontFamilies.secondary: Clean sans-serif (similar to Inter or Montserrat)
fontFamilies.usage: Serif for headlines (h1, h2, h3), sans-serif for body text and UI elements

typography.hierarchy: Strong contrast between headline weight and body text. Headlines are light and elegant, body text is comfortable to read

sections.description: Generous vertical spacing between major sections

container.description: Centered content with breathing room on sides

cards.description: Comfortable internal padding with clear separation

grid.description: Architectural precision with clear column divisions

principles: 50/50 split for hero sections with image and content
Full-width sections that alternate between light and dark
Centered text in key sections for emphasis
layout.structure: Clean horizontal divisions with full-bleed backgrounds, contained content within max-width containers

primary.hover: Subtle opacity change (0.9) or slight background lightening

cards.hover: Subtle lift with shadow increase: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)

icons.size: 24-32px for card icons, 20px for inline icons
icons.style: Lucide icons with clean, minimal aesthetic

images.aspectRatio: Varies by section - 16:9 for hero, 4:3 for features
images.overlay: Subtle gradient overlays when text is overlaid (rgba(0,0,0,0.2-0.4))

dividers.usage: Sparingly - gold accent lines (#C8A882) for decorative purposes

animations.easing: ease or cubic-bezier for smooth, elegant motion
animations.scroll: Gentle fade-in and slide-up effects on section entry

imagery.composition: Clean, uncluttered compositions with clear subjects

hero.alignment: Left-aligned text with ample left padding

testimonial.layout: Centered single column or 2-column with image

footer.layout: Multi-column with logo, links, and legal

accessibility.contrast: WCAG AA minimum - white text on dark backgrounds, dark text on light
accessibility.focusIndicators: Clear gold outline on interactive elements
accessibility.touchTargets: Minimum 44x44px for buttons and interactive elements
